DialogueNode.prompt: Oh hello... are you lost kitten?

DialogueResponse.text: No, I'd advise you not to prrrovoke me.
Yes, can you help me please?

DialogueNode.prompt: Is that a threat I smell? You've crossed with the wrong dog.

DialogueResponse.text: Well you've lost an eye already, maybe you crossed the wrong kitty!

DialogueNode.prompt: Sure..., if you come dock at my port, we can go over the space map...

DialogueResponse.text: Um...I'm not sure...
Ok! Thanks alot sir... what's your name?

DialogueNode.prompt: Oh don't be afraid. I'm not going to hurt you!

DialogueResponse.text: Ok. What do others call you?

DialogueNode.prompt: They call me many names... Captain Shibe, Lone Shibe, OneEye. Come, come.

DialogueResponse.text: I made up my mind. I'm just going to continue my path. Thanks anyways.
How did you lose your eye?

DialogueNode.prompt: Never ask me that, they took it from me!!! Those foul cats...

DialogueResponse.text: Uh I'm sorry!! (Crap.)
(Run... boosters on fast!!)
Wasn't me! :D

DialogueNode.prompt: Are you refusing my help?? You'll regret this...

DialogueResponse.text: Great a nutso. (Let's fight!)
Here have some DogeCoins and forget you saw me! (Pay 5 DogeCoins)

DialogueNode.prompt: What?! You think this is funny?? RRROOF. *Snarl*

DialogueResponse.text: Hells yeaaaa! (Let's fight!)
Here have some DogeCoins and forget you saw me! :P (Pay 10 DogeCoins)

DialogueNode.prompt: Bribery? You will not get out of this alive.

DialogueResponse.text: (Let's fight!)
Hello? Are you alright?
(Go towards the stationary ship.)
(Move on)

DialogueNode.prompt: (static lessens) Oh thank the dogs... please help, there's something wrong with my ship. My name's OneEye.

DialogueResponse.text: Well OneEye, what can I do?
I don't have alot of time.

DialogueNode.prompt: If you can dock, I'd show you what's wrong and maybe you can lend a hand?

DialogueResponse.text: Um...I'm not sure...
I won't dock but I'm nearby, can you explain?

DialogueNode.prompt: Oh please! My booster's wire got gnawed off by those nasty space rats, do you have a replacement on you?

DialogueResponse.text: No, sorry I don't happen to have spares.
No, here's some dogecoins for the next person that comes around to help you. Maybe you can buy a part then.

DialogueNode.prompt: You refuse to help a dog shipmate!?

DialogueResponse.text: I made up my mind. I'm just going to continue my path. Sorry.
I don't have the part, sorry! I can't do anything about it.

DialogueNode.prompt: That's not enough, ... I'll just take your ship instead!!!

DialogueResponse.text: Great a nutso.
You are NOT touching my ship pup! (Fight)

DialogueNode.prompt: *Snarl* You useless pup! I'll take your ship now!!

DialogueResponse.text: You can try! Not happening. (Let's fight!)
